text: <@U01S1VB9X9P> if the order is not present in the blotter, flumine tries to manually add the order to the blotter. For this, it needs to grab the strategy that placed this order (using the strategy_hash that is saved within the order)

btw you can reduce your connection count by setting the order stream to false on the client when you are collecting data
```client = clients.BetfairClient(trading, order_stream=False)```

text: It takes a while for the connections to drop off at the Betfair end. I suspect that it happens when the buffer becomes full and it can't push anything else out to you, so resets the connection. If your old connections weren't receiving huge amounts of data that may take a while, but it will happen.

elements.text: It takes a while for the connections to drop off at the Betfair end. I suspect that it happens when the buffer becomes full and it can't push anything else out to you, so resets the connection. If your old connections weren't receiving huge amounts of data that may take a while, but it will happen.
